text: Facebook made of virtual reality headset
called the oculus rift it's a
lightweight virtual reality headset that
you use with a very powerful gaming PC
this is what we love the most about the
oculus rift so while there are lots of
amazing things about the oculus rift
just the fact that it actually delivers
real virtual reality at your home the
coolest thing so far has been the sense
of place that you get from certain games
where you go and you explore and you
have actual memories of that place
specifically one game this game called
wind lands which is a fantastical game
where you fly around the world I have
all these very specific memories like as
if I went there because I did actually
go there and that's really at the heart
of this amazing high-end virtual reality
we see from Facebook which I recognize
sounds crazy but means this huge thing
for video games it means that there's
this much deeper level of experiential
memory that comes with having played
these games that is bigger than just
remembering how to get from point A to
point B the bigger picture here is that
there's going to be some really
incredible things that can be done with
virtual reality in terms of virtual
tourism in terms of Education in terms
of enabling the disabled to visit places
that they can't I'm never going to the
top of Everest but with the oculus rift
I can go there and that's pretty amazing
